script.source: zypper -n mr --priority=1 'nodejs_alias' --name='nodejs' --no-refresh zypper -n ar --name='openSUSE-13.1-1.7' --type='yast2' --disable 'cd:///?devices=/dev/disk/by-id/ata-Optiarc_DVD+_-RW_AD-7200S,/dev/sr0' 'openSUSE-13.1-1.7_alias' zypper -n mr --priority=2 'openSUSE-13.1-1.7_alias' --name='openSUSE-13.1-1.7' --no-refresh zypper -n mr --priority=3 'repo_without_type_alias' --name='repo_without_type' --no-refresh zypper -n ar --name='disabled_repo' --disable 'http://disabled-repo' 'disabled_repo_alias' zypper -n mr --priority=3 'disabled_repo_alias' --name='disabled_repo' --no-refresh zypper -n mr --priority=2 'autorefresh_enabled_alias' --name='autorefresh_enabled' --refresh zypper -n ar --name='dvd_entry' --type='yast2' 'dvd:///?devices=/dev/disk/by-id/ata-Optiarc_DVD+_-RW_AD-7200S,/dev/sr0' 'dvd_entry_alias' zypper -n mr --priority=2 'dvd_entry_alias' --name='dvd_entry' --no-refresh zypper -n mr --priority=2 'NCCRepo' --name='NCC Repository' --refresh zypper -n mr --priority=1 'Alias With Spaces' --name='nodejs' --no-refresh mkdir -p '/mnt/etc' curl -o '/mnt/etc/cron tab' "`cat /tmp/description_url`/config_files/etc/cron%20tab" mkdir -p '/mnt/etc' curl -o '/mnt/etc/deleted config' "`cat /tmp/description_url`/config_files/etc/deleted%20config" chown root:root '/mnt/etc/deleted config' chmod 644 '/mnt/etc/deleted config' chown root:root '/mnt/etc/cron tab' chmod 644 '/mnt/etc/cron tab' mkdir -p '/mnt/etc/cron.daily' curl -o '/mnt/etc/cron.daily/cleanup' "`cat /tmp/description_url`/changed_managed_files/etc/cron.daily/cleanup" mkdir -p '/mnt/etc/cron.daily' curl -o '/mnt/etc/cron.daily/logrotate' "`cat /tmp/description_url`/changed_managed_files/etc/cron.daily/logrotate" mkdir -p '/mnt/etc' curl -o '/mnt/etc/deleted changed managed' "`cat /tmp/description_url`/changed_managed_files/etc/deleted%20changed%20managed" chown root:root '/mnt/etc/deleted changed managed' chmod 644 '/mnt/etc/deleted changed managed' chown user:group '/mnt/etc/cron.daily/cleanup' chmod 644 '/mnt/etc/cron.daily/cleanup' chown user:group '/mnt/etc/cron.daily/logrotate' chmod 644 '/mnt/etc/cron.daily/logrotate' curl -o '/mnt/tmp/filter' "`cat /tmp/description_url`/unmanaged_files_autoyast_excludes" curl -o '/mnt/tmp/files.tgz' "`cat /tmp/description_url`/unmanaged_files/files.tgz" tar -C /mnt/ -X '/mnt/tmp/filter' -xf '/mnt/tmp/files.tgz' rm '/mnt/tmp/files.tgz' curl -o '/mnt/tmp/tarball with spaces.tgz' "`cat /tmp/description_url`/unmanaged_files/trees/etc/tarball%20with%20spaces.tgz" tar -C /mnt/ -X '/mnt/tmp/filter' -xf '/mnt/tmp/tarball with spaces.tgz' rm '/mnt/tmp/tarball with spaces.tgz'
